name: GHAWASA
description:
GHAWASA

A mini metroidvania game which you control a submarine to explore the depths, but to go further  you need to upgrade your oxygen level.

You can also upgrade your health and missiles to defeat enemies along your way.

PS: GHAWASA means submarine in arabic.

==== Controls ==== 

Arrows to move and X to shoot

==== Credits ====

Code and Arts by me

SoundEffects by @trix

Made for NOKIA 3310 JAM 4
